title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 & Z Flip 5 hands-on
tags: samsung galaxy z fold 5 release date
description:
The new $999 Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 and $1,799 Galaxy Z Fold 5 both feature an all new flex hinge that allows the phones to fold completely flat. It’s a small update but it makes a big difference in how the devices feel in hand. The more exciting update comes to the Galaxy Z Flip 5 though. The phone now features a bigger 3.4-inch outside screen that allows users to browse more notifications, see a full calendar, or text on a full keyboard. A viable outside screen! Both devices will be available August 11th. #samsung #samsunggalaxy #technology
